nodes.text: Grace was a spiritual concept, likely native to Devaron, which required its adherents to demonstrate certain virtues. Grace could be lost or gained; Kardue'sai'Malloc, a believer in Grace, claimed to gain grace through displays of patience and restraint and to lose it during a period of dissoluteness and despondence. He also claimed that Wuher's hatred of the universe had a spiritual purity approaching Grace but that his love of money kept him from achieving it.
